tasks.prompt: Read the text and answer the questions.

context.title: At the Clinic
body: I go to a clinic today. The nurse looks at my head and asks if it feels hot.
She tells me to wash my face and hands before the check.
My hair is clean because I washed it in the morning.
The doctor checks my eyes. I can see the big letters on the wall.
He also checks my ears. I can hear his quiet voice.
I have a little cold, so I wipe my nose with a tissue.
The doctor says, 'Open your mouth and say ah.'
He looks at my teeth and says they are clean.
Then I turn my neck slowly. It is okay.
At the end, I roll my shoulders and feel relaxed.
